smoothies.title: Polyphenol Power Smoothie
ingredients: ½ green banana (prebiotic, feeds good bacteria)
½ cup pomegranate juice (polyphenols, reduce harmful bacteria)
½ cup kombucha (probiotics, support gut balance)
smoothies.why: Rich in polyphenols, prebiotics, and probiotics to target Bacteroides overgrowth and promote good bacteria like Bifidobacteria.

smoothies.title: Green Gut Detox Smoothie
smoothies.why: Boosts beneficial bacteria (Bifidobacteria and Lactobacillus) with prebiotics and probiotics, while reducing gut inflammation.

smoothies.title: Berry Blast Prebiotic Smoothie
ingredients: ½ green banana (prebiotic, feeds good bacteria)
1 tbsp chia seeds (fiber, omega-3s, support gut health)
½ cup pomegranate juice (polyphenols, fight inflammation)
smoothies.why: High in fiber, prebiotics, and polyphenols to feed good bacteria and reduce harmful bacteria overgrowth.

smoothies.title: Fiber-Boost Smoothie
ingredients: ½ cup blackberries (polyphenols, reduce gut inflammation)
1 tbsp chicory root powder (prebiotic, supports beneficial bacteria)
smoothies.why: Packed with fiber and prebiotics to promote beneficial bacteria growth and balance the gut microbiome.

smoothies.title: Ginger-Turmeric Gut Soother
ingredients: ½ inch fresh ginger (anti-inflammatory, gut calming)
½ cup kefir (probiotics, boost beneficial bacteria)
smoothies.why: Focuses on reducing inflammation with ginger and turmeric, while providing probiotics and fiber for gut health.

smoothies.title: Anti-Inflammatory Avocado Smoothie
ingredients: ½ cup kefir (probiotics, boost good bacteria)
smoothies.why: Helps reduce gut inflammation while supporting digestion and promoting beneficial bacteria with kefir.

smoothies.title: Blueberry-Kefir Gut Restorer
ingredients: ½ green banana (prebiotic, feeds good bacteria)
½ cup kefir (probiotics, support gut balance)
1 tsp chicory root powder (prebiotic, promotes Bifidobacteria)
smoothies.why: Contains probiotics and polyphenols to restore gut balance but is less fiber-dense than other options.
